response.text: Dear devotee, dharma is the eternal law that sustains all creation. As I taught Arjuna in the sacred Bhagavad Gita, dharma represents your righteous duty that aligns with your svadharma - your inherent nature and divine purpose. In the modern world, dharma manifests as living with integrity, serving others selflessly, and fulfilling your responsibilities while maintaining spiritual awareness.
response.sanskritText: धर्म एव हतो हन्ति धर्मो रक्षति रक्षितः
response.transliteration: dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakṣati rakṣitaḥ

citations.translation: You have a right to perform your prescribed duty, but not to the fruits of action.

citations.verse: धर्म एव हतो हन्ति धर्मो रक्षति रक्षितः
citations.translation: Dharma destroys those who destroy it; dharma protects those who protect it.
